name: @wowjinxy/mcp-discord
description: Manage your Discord communities from one place. Browse servers and channels, view members and user details, send or read messages, and add reactions. Create and delete channels, assign roles, and moderate content with message deletion and timeouts.

tools.name: list_servers
tools.description: List the Discord servers the bot is currently connected to.

tools.name: get_server_info
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a Discord server.

tools.name: get_channels
tools.description: List channels for a Discord server grouped by category.

tools.name: list_roles
tools.description: List all roles defined in the Discord server.

tools.name: list_members
tools.description: List members of a Discord server.

tools.name: get_user_info
tools.description: Fetch information about a specific Discord user.

tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send a message to a Discord text channel or thread.

tools.name: read_messages
tools.description: Read recent messages from a channel.

tools.name: add_reaction
tools.description: Add a reaction to a specific message.

tools.name: add_multiple_reactions
tools.description: Add multiple reactions to a message.

tools.name: remove_reaction
tools.description: Remove the bot's reaction from a message.

tools.name: pin_message
tools.description: Pin a message in a text channel.

tools.name: unpin_message
tools.description: Unpin a message in a text channel.

tools.name: bulk_delete_messages
tools.description: Delete multiple recent messages from a channel.

tools.name: create_text_channel
tools.description: Create a new text channel in the specified server.

tools.name: create_voice_channel
tools.description: Create a new voice channel in the specified server.

tools.name: create_stage_channel
tools.description: Create a new stage channel for events and announcements.

tools.name: create_category
tools.description: Create a new channel category.

tools.name: update_channel
tools.description: Update channel settings such as name, topic, and category.

tools.name: delete_channel
tools.description: Delete a Discord channel.

tools.name: create_invite
tools.description: Create an invite link for a channel.

tools.name: list_invites
tools.description: List active invites for a server.

tools.name: create_role
tools.description: Create a new role in the specified server.

tools.name: edit_role
tools.description: Update the configuration of an existing role.

tools.name: delete_role
tools.description: Delete a role from the server.

tools.name: add_role
tools.description: Add a role to a Discord user.

tools.name: remove_role
tools.description: Remove a role from a Discord user.

tools.name: kick_member
tools.description: Kick a member from the server.

tools.name: ban_member
tools.description: Ban a user from the server.

tools.name: unban_member
tools.description: Remove a ban for a user.

tools.name: list_bans
tools.description: List banned users for the server.

tools.name: timeout_member
tools.description: Apply or clear a communication timeout for a member.

tools.name: moderate_message
tools.description: Moderate a message by deleting it and optionally timing out the author.
